full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BRTAN BZHUGS GSOL 'DEBS BZHED DON LHUN GRUB MA CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI MKHAN CHEN NYO MONG HANG GI SPRUL SKU TSE RING RDO RJE'I ZHABS @003B BRTAN GSOL 'DEBS BZHED DON LHUN GRUB MA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DE NYID KYI ZHABS GRUB NAS BSKUL MA BYUNG BA'I NGOR, ,RJE BTZUN DAM PA NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG CHOS KYI NYI MA BSTAN 'DZIN DBANG PHYUG DPAL BZANG POS SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I MDO SNGAGS GNYIS KYI BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE PHYOGS THAMS CAD DU DAR ZHING RGYAS LA PHUN RING DU GNAS PA DANG, ,MAR GYUR SEMS CAN THAMS CAD BDE SKYID PHUN SUM TSOGS PA DANG LDAN PAR GYUR CIG , ,,MANGGA LAm, ,)
author_simple: NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG CHOS KYI NYI MA BSTAN 'DZIN DBANG PHYUG
